column6: Welcome to Taiwan. This report is based on an interesting building, where you can take, for your students to visit. This building is situated in Taipei, the capital. The building is called the Chiang Kei-shek MomerialMemorial Hall. Nearly everyone knows where this building is, so if you have a chance, just ask the local people in Taipei about this building.
